summary: Adds Crafting Recipies for Black Soul Gems, Azuras Star, The Black Star
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds crafting recipies for Black Soul Gems, Azuras Star and The Black Star.
You can craft them at a normal Blacksmith Forge.
You need the \"Arcane Enchanting\" Perk for crafting them.
It\'s more like a duplication, so you can\'t craft it before doing the quest.
____________________________________________________________________________
Recipies:

2x Azuras Star:

[list]
[*]Azuras Star
[*]5x Grand Soul Gems
[/list]
___________________
The Black Star:

[list]
[*]Azuras Star
[*]Black Soul Gem
[/list]
___________________
2x The Black Star:

[list]
[*]The Black Star
[*]5x Black Soul Gems
[/list]
___________________
Black Soul Gems:

[list]
[*]5x Refined Soul Gem Fragment
[/list]
___________________
Refined Soul Gem Fragment (the mod provides 5 versions of this recipe, because there are 5 different
Soul Gem Fragments):

[list]
[*]Soul Gem Fragment
[/list]
___________________
[b]Now added:[/b]
Azuras Star:

[list]
[*]The Black Star
[*]Grand Soul Gem
[/list]

____________________________________________________________________________

inspired by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/441208][u][b]Windrider494[/b][/u][/url]\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10808][b]Soul Gem Chest plus Craftable Azuras Star[/b][/url]
author: Me

files.name: CSG_1_1
files.changelogHtml: Added Black Star + Grand Soul Gem = Azuras Star recipe
